body: Hey I'm new to this server and I only found out about it by a friend of mine and I'd like to know the rules and any other polices and such also AMA
body_tagged: Hey I'm new to this server and I only found out about it by a friend of mine and I'd like to know the rules and any other polices and such also AMA
title: Hi im new (AMA)

replies.body:
Hi welcome to the server and the forums!

Make sure to read the rules which can be found here: https://avicus.net/rules
If you have any questions or concerns, don't be afraid to talk to a staff member.

Enjoy your stay!

What's your favorite color?
